page.title: 15High Street Ilchester
page.content: I live in{High Street}next door to a {grocery shop}called Eastons. I live in two houses with my Mum, Dad, Grandad, brother and sister. High Street is a friendly place of about{50}people. Just along the road is a{chemist shop {owned by Mrs.Nielson. Her}assistant is my next door neighbour. At the end of the road is the{market square,}a grassy area with some lovely trees. Two years ago my sister and some other schoolchildren planted it with flowers that the Town Trust bought. When High Street was part of the main{A303 road}it was a noisy and dangerous place but when the{by-pass was built it became a quieter {cul-de-sac.}I think peole liked that!It was easy to cross the road again, children could play more safely and the houses were no longer splashed with mud from all the lorries
